title: 年末にかけての下落リスクを軽減する価格帯は？　ビットコイン最新市場分析＝Glassnode
contentSnippet: Glassnodeが仮想通貨ビットコイン市場の最新週間レポートを発表。需要低迷と含み損拡大の中、年末の下落リスクを抑える価格帯などを分析している。

title: JPモルガンがストラテジーのビットコイン売却回避能力を評価、「マイナーの動きより重要」
contentSnippet: JPモルガンのアナリストが、ストラテジーのビットコイン売却回避能力がBTC価格の短期見通しにおいてマイナー活動より重要だと分析した。

title: 21シェアーズ、米国初のスイ（SUI）連動2倍レバレッジETFを上場
contentSnippet: 21シェアーズが米国証券取引委員会の承認を得て、スイ(SUI)の価格に連動する初のレバレッジETFをナスダックに上場した。日次リターンの2倍を提供する商品で、スイエコシステムに関連する初のETFとなる。

title: 「政府系ファンドは相場下落時にビットコインを買い増し」ブラックロックのフィンクCEOが明かす
contentSnippet: ブラックロックのラリー・フィンクCEOは、複数の政府系ファンドが仮想通貨ビットコインを購入していると明かした。相場下落時に買い増ししている様子も伝えている。

title: Stablecoin Adoption Could Stifle Central Bank Control, IMF Warns
contentSnippet: Stablecoins have the potential to broaden individuals’ access to financial services, but that may come at the cost of central banks, per IMF.

title: ソラナとベース間ブリッジが稼働開始、チェーンリンクとコインベースが安全性確保
contentSnippet: レイヤー2ベースチェーンがソラナとのブリッジをメインネットで正式稼働。チェーンリンクCCIPを採用し、両チェーン間でのトークン移動と取引が可能になった。

title: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse Expects Bitcoin to Hit $180K Next Year
contentSnippet: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse thinks Bitcoin will be trading at $180,000 at the close of 2026, nearly double the current price.

title: メタがメタバース予算を最大30%削減検討、VR・ホライゾン・ワールズが対象＝報道
contentSnippet: ザッカーバーグのメタ社がメタバース関連事業の予算を来年最大30%削減する検討を進めている。投資家から歓迎され株価が上昇した。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Myriad Moves: Bitcoin and Ethereum Recovery Odds Rise as Traders Flip Bullish
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on where Bitcoin and Ethereum are headed next, plus odds of another major liquidation event.

title: Hua Xia state-linked Chinese bank tokenizes $600M in yuan bonds
contentSnippet: The bond was auctioned off to holders of the digital yuan, a central bank digital currency (CBDC) developed by the Chinese government.

title: Former Binance.US CEO launches stablecoin platform ahead of L1 network
contentSnippet: After securing $20 million in seed funding for the project in January, Brian Shroder announced a step toward 1Money’s planned stablecoin network.

title: Solana and Ethereum Network Base Are Now Connected Thanks to Coinbase and Chainlink
contentSnippet: Solana and Base are now connected thanks to a new bridge secured by Chainlink's interoperability protocol and crypto exchange Coinbase.

title: ロシアが仮想通貨マイニング収益の公式統計反映を検討、隠れた輸出として年間数千億円規模か
contentSnippet: ロシア大統領府のオレシュキン副長官が仮想通貨マイニング収益を貿易収支に計上すべきだと提案した。マイニング収益は1日約10億ルーブルに達し、隠れた輸出として外国為替市場に影響を与えているという。

title: CNBC taps Kalshi to bring real-time prediction data into financial coverage
contentSnippet: Kalshi will provide real-time prediction data across CNBC’s TV, digital and subscription platforms beginning in 2026 as part of a mult-year partnership.

title: Canton Network Creator Snags Strategic Investment from Wall Street Giants
contentSnippet: BNY, Nasdaq, iCapital and S&P Global invested in Digital Assets, powering blockchain infrastructure for tokenized real-world assets.

title: Ether outpaces Bitcoin’s trend change: Is ETH on track for a 20% rally?
contentSnippet: ETH outperformed Bitcoin in terms of spot ETF flows and short-term returns. Technical charts suggest traders are positioning for a 20% upmove.

title: ソフトバンクなど出資のビットコイン企業「21キャピタル」、12月9日から「XXI」で取引開始
contentSnippet: ビットコイン特化企業の21キャピタルとカンター・エクイティ・パートナーズの事業統合が株主承認を得た。ティッカーシンボル「XXI」として株式の取引を開始。

title: In wake of crypto’s leverage wipeout, SEC approves ‘SUI-on-steroids’ ETF
contentSnippet: The SEC approved a 2x leveraged ETF tied to SUI as regulators warn that excessive leverage continues to amplify volatility across crypto markets.

title: Kraken Partners With Deutsche Börse as Europe Looks to Rival Wall Street in Crypto
contentSnippet: Deutsche Börse Group (DBG) and Kraken announced a strategic partnership signalling acceleration of crypto adoption across Europe and a clear intention to compete with Wall Street.

title: CFTCが仮想通貨現物取引を連邦規制市場で初承認、米国で取引開始へ
contentSnippet: 米CFTCが仮想通貨現物商品取引の許可を発表した。CFTC登録先物取引所で初めて取引が可能となり、厳格な監督と投資家保護の下で安全に取引できる環境が整った。

title: Peter Schiff fails to authenticate gold bar during onstage test with CZ
contentSnippet: Gold advocate Peter Schiff faced Binance co-founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao during an event panel in Dubai, arguing that tokenized gold is a better store-of-value asset than Bitcoin.

title: Privacy-First 'Alien' Identity System Aims to Prove Users Are Human in the Age of AI
contentSnippet: Alien’s privacy-focused decentralized app verifies users without storing biometrics or government IDs. Here's how it works.

title: After Faking Death, Zerebro Founder Unveils AI-Penned Manifesto and New Solana Coin
contentSnippet: The manifesto argues for a future in which AI and humans will converge biologically, chemically, and surgically in a new form of humanity.

title: Bitcoin Could Continue Chopping Below $95K Into Year-End and Altcoins Could Benefit, Analyst Says
contentSnippet: Low-liquidity in December may cap bitcoin's recovery rally, but rangebound trading for the largest crypto could benefit smaller digital assets, Wincent's Paul Howard said.

title: Bitcoin price action, investor sentiment point to bullish December
contentSnippet: An emerging bullish Bitcoin trend challenges a decade-long bearish seasonal pattern. Will BTC hit new highs before the end of 2025?

title: IMF lays out guidelines for addressing stablecoin risks, beyond regulations
contentSnippet: The fund identified “strong macro-policies and robust institutions” as a response to the potential risks of stablecoins, above a patchwork of global regulations.

title: CFTC Gives Green Light to Spot Crypto Trading as Bitnomial Exchange Readies for Launch
contentSnippet: Acting CFTC Chair Caroline Pham described the move as unprecedented.

title: Coinbase, Chainlink Introduce Base-Solana Bridge to Link Ecosystems
contentSnippet: The bridge, secured by Chainlink's Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol, allows users to trade and interact with Solana-based tokens on Base-based dapps.

title: How an AI Wiz Used ChatGPT to Turn the Tables on a Scammer
contentSnippet: An IT worker claims he "vibe coded" a phishing page via AI to unmask a would-be scammer in Delhi, prompting panicked pleas for mercy.

title: Twenty One Capital eyes Tuesday debut following Cantor Equity Partners merger
contentSnippet: Bitcoin-focused Twenty One Capital is set to go public on the NYSE after winning shareholder approval for its merger with Cantor Equity Partners.

title: Bitcoin’s Negative Correlation With Nasdaq Persists, and History Suggests a Bottom May Be Forming
contentSnippet: Historical patterns show that bitcoin often bottoms when its correlation with the Nasdaq 100 breaks down, a dynamic now appearing for the fourth time in five years.

title: Crypto Investor Donates $12M to UK's Reform Party
contentSnippet: Christopher Harborne has invested in stablecoin issuer Tether and crypto exchange Bitfinex, according to reports.

title: Ex-Signature Bank Execs Launch Blockchain-Powered Narrow Bank Backed by Paradigm, Winklevoss
contentSnippet: N3XT Bank, operating under a Wyoming charter, aims to provide programmable U.S. dollar payments around the clock without lending deposits.

title: TD Cowen Grows Bearish on $60 Billion Bitcoin Giant Strategy—Here's Why
contentSnippet: After Strategy established a $1.44 billion cash reserve and said it may need to sell Bitcoin, TD Cowen has lowed its MSTR price target.

title: Reform UK Gets Britain's Biggest Political Donation Ever From Tether Investor
contentSnippet: DigFinex shareholder Christopher Harborne donated $11.4 million to Reform UK, the largest ever gift to a UK political party by a living donor.

title: Sovereign Wealth Funds Were Buyers as Bitcoin Plunged: BlackRock's Larry Fink
contentSnippet: The CEO of the asset management giant, whose IBIT is the largest of the spot BTC ETFs, said the state actors were buying not for a trade, but to hold for years.

title: BNB Nears $910 as Volume Jumps 68%, Signaling Growing Interest Near Resistance Zone
contentSnippet: The token is trading in a sideways range, holding above recent lows near $896, while a breakout above $920-$928 resistance could push BNB toward $1,000.

title: Meta Plans 30% Cut to Metaverse Budget as Reality Becomes Less Virtual: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Horizon Worlds and Quest are facing layoffs as Meta retreats further from its $70 billion bet on virtual reality, people familiar with the matter told Bloomberg.

title: MUFGグループ、トークン化MMFの商品化へ Progmatと協業開始
contentSnippet: 2026年に機関投資家向け提供を目指す三菱UFJアセットマネジメント、三菱UFJモルガン・スタンレー証券、三菱UFJ信託銀行の3社は4日、Progmat（プログマ）との協業を発表した。日本初となるトークン化投資信託の商品化に向け、基盤整備を...
